the plate"},{"lineNumber":253194,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　巨大かなみをぶつける","translatedEnglishLine":"> Hit with a giant Kanami"},{"lineNumber":253195,"originalJapaneseLine":"選択後","translatedEnglishLine":"After choosing"},{"lineNumber":253196,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、ここに隠れて居るぞ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I'm hiding here..."},{"lineNumber":253197,"originalJapaneseLine":"じっ・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Stare..."},{"lineNumber":253198,"originalJapaneseLine":"するとバボラが皿を持った、ふわっと浮上していく","translatedEnglishLine":"Then little."},{"lineNumber":253200,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラの足、腰・・あたり・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Around Babora's feet and waist..."},{"lineNumber":253201,"originalJapaneseLine":"料理が落ちないようにバボラがおっとっととゆっくり上げている","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora is carefully raising it slowly so the food doesn't fall."},{"lineNumber":253202,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達も、ぐらぐらと落ちないように注意・・誰かに抱きつかれるとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others also carefully steady themselves so as not to fall... like being grabbed by someone."},{"lineNumber":253203,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふぉーーーーん、何か音がなった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Fwoooon, some kind of sound was heard."},{"lineNumber":253204,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラの食事の時間の合図","translatedEnglishLine":"It was the signal for Babora’s meal time."},{"lineNumber":253205,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が隠れている皿が持ち上げられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The plate Lance and the others are hiding under is lifted up."},{"lineNumber":253206,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと落ちそうになったりとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It almost fell a little..."},{"lineNumber":253207,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、目の前にバボラの顔がきた","translatedEnglishLine":"And then Babora’s face came right in front of them."},{"lineNumber":253208,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラは食事しようとして皿を持ち上げていたのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora was lifting the plate to eat."},{"lineNumber":253209,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、作戦成功だ。足では逃げられたが顔を潰せば勝ちだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, the plan worked. Although it escaped with its feet, if we crush its face, we win."},{"lineNumber":253210,"originalJapaneseLine":"いくぞー","translatedEnglishLine":"Here we go—"},{"lineNumber":253211,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle"},{"lineNumber":253212,"originalJapaneseLine":"この戦闘においては、毎ターン　バボラを混乱させておく必要があります","translatedEnglishLine":"In this battle, you need to keep Babora confused every turn."},{"lineNumber":253213,"originalJapaneseLine":"混乱してないと、正気に戻り、冷静に対処を考えてしまうため、３回正気だとそれで負けます","translatedEnglishLine":"If not confused, Babora regains composure and thinks calmly about countermeasures; if it is sane three times, you lose."},{"lineNumber":253214,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":253215,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラ、皿をもったまま何か考えている","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora is thinking about something while holding the plate."},{"lineNumber":253216,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれ・・なんで食べ物か殴ってくるのだ、痛いよ、これ","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh... why is it hitting the food? This hurts."},{"lineNumber":253217,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か考えている","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s thinking about something."},{"lineNumber":253218,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle"},{"lineNumber":253219,"originalJapaneseLine":"この戦闘においては、毎ターン　バボラを混乱させておく必要があります","translatedEnglishLine":"In this battle, you need to keep Babora confused every turn."},{"lineNumber":253220,"originalJapaneseLine":"混乱してないと、正気に戻り、冷静に対処を考えてしまうため、３回正気だとそれで負けます","translatedEnglishLine":"If not confused, Babora regains composure and thinks calmly about countermeasures; if it is sane three times, you lose."},{"lineNumber":253221,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":253222,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラ考える・・・はっ何か思いついたみたい","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora is thinking... aha, it seems to have come up with something."},{"lineNumber":253223,"originalJapaneseLine":"皿をふりふりする、ランス達があわあわと揺れる","translatedEnglishLine":"It shakes the plate, Lance and the others wobble anxiously."},{"lineNumber":253224,"originalJapaneseLine":"まずいぞ奴に気がつかれたかも","translatedEnglishLine":"This is bad, it might have noticed us."},{"lineNumber":253225,"originalJapaneseLine":"気がつかれてたった・・何に？","translatedEnglishLine":"It's noticed us... at what?"},{"lineNumber":253226,"originalJapaneseLine":"顔面前で皿を持っているのはあいつ自身だ、この皿をひっくり返されたら","translatedEnglishLine":"The one holding the plate in front of its face is it itself; if this plate is flipped over,"},{"lineNumber":253227,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺達は地上にまっさかさに落ちて・・この高さだと死ぬ","translatedEnglishLine":"we’ll plummet straight down to the ground... at this height, we’d die."},{"lineNumber":253228,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle"},{"lineNumber":253229,"originalJapaneseLine":"この戦闘においては、毎ターン　バボラを混乱させておく必要があります","translatedEnglishLine":"In this battle, you need to keep Babora confused every turn."},{"lineNumber":253230,"originalJapaneseLine":"混乱してないと、正気に戻り、冷静に対処を考えてしまうため、３回正気だとそれで負けます","translatedEnglishLine":"If not confused, Babora regains composure and thinks calmly about countermeasures; if it is sane three times, you lose."},{"lineNumber":253231,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":253232,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラ考える・・・ぴこーん閃いた","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora is thinking... ding! It’s had an idea."},{"lineNumber":253233,"originalJapaneseLine":"おお、そうか","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, I see."},{"lineNumber":253234,"originalJapaneseLine":"皿をひっくり返した、ランス達、あれーーーと落ちる","translatedEnglishLine":"It flipped the plate over; Lance and the others go 'whah—' and fall."},{"lineNumber":253235,"originalJapaneseLine":"ｇａｍｅｏｖｅｒ","translatedEnglishLine":"Game Over"},{"lineNumber":253236,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人バボラは顔を攻撃されまくって失神寸前","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Babora is being pummeled in the face and is about to faint."},{"lineNumber":253237,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふらふらと倒れていく、あっ、ランス様　こっちに倒れると下の方に町があります。","translatedEnglishLine":"It staggers and begins to fall. Ah, Lord Lance, if it falls this way, there’s a town down below."},{"lineNumber":253238,"originalJapaneseLine":"町が下敷きになってしまいます。","translatedEnglishLine":"The town would be crushed underneath."},{"lineNumber":253239,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、こっちに倒れるな　ランスキーーック","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, don’t fall that way! Lance Kick!"},{"lineNumber":253240,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスキックで頭を蹴り、後ろに倒れるようにする","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance kicks its head, making it fall backward."},{"lineNumber":253241,"originalJapaneseLine":"倒れたバボラは魔物軍を多数踏みつぶして息絶える","translatedEnglishLine":"Fallen Babora crushes many of the monster army and expires."},{"lineNumber":253242,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘後、ラングバウ","translatedEnglishLine":"After the battle, at Langbau."},{"lineNumber":253243,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は戻っており、シーラ、クリーム、ヒューバートなどと話","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others have returned and are talking with Sheila, Cream, Hubert, and others."},{"lineNumber":253244,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人バボラは倒れ、死んだ事により、魔軍は動揺したのかちりぢりに逃げていった","translatedEnglishLine":"With demon Babora defeated and dead, the demon army was unsettled and scattered to flee."},{"lineNumber":253245,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン軍が追撃をかけてだいぶ奪われた土地を取り返す事に成功","translatedEnglishLine":"Hermann's army launched a pursuit and succeeded in reclaiming much of the lost land."},{"lineNumber":253246,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとか戦線は維持された、だが、まだ魔人ケッセルリンクと数十万の魔軍が","translatedEnglishLine":"The front line is somehow maintained, but the demon Kesselring and hundreds of thousands of demon troops"},{"lineNumber":253247,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン方面に展開しており楽観は出来ない状況","translatedEnglishLine":"are deployed near Hermann’s area, so the situation cannot be taken lightly."},{"lineNumber":253248,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんかキャラ同士の掛け合い、ビジュアルは無いけどシーラとのエロでもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Somewhat having banter between characters; there’s no visual, but maybe an erotic scene with Sheila would be good."},{"lineNumber":253249,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、魔物大将軍ルメイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the great demon general Lumei."},{"lineNumber":253250,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラ様がやられただと・・ぐぬぬぬぬぬ","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora-sama was defeated... Grrrrrrrrr."},{"lineNumber":253251,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔剣カオスの存在は事実だったのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"So the existence of the demon sword Chaos was true..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択肢
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Choices

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　皿に隠れておく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Hide under the plate

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　巨大かなみをぶつける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Hit with a giant Kanami

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After choosing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、ここに隠れて居るぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'm hiding here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じっ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stare...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: するとバボラが皿を持った、ふわっと浮上していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Babora held the plate and floated up gently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し揺れながら上がっていく途中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As it rose, it swayed a little.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラの足、腰・・あたり・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around Babora's feet and waist...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 料理が落ちないようにバボラがおっとっととゆっくり上げている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora is carefully raising it slowly so the food doesn't fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達も、ぐらぐらと落ちないように注意・・誰かに抱きつかれるとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others also carefully steady themselves so as not to fall... like being grabbed by someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふぉーーーーん、何か音がなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fwoooon, some kind of sound was heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラの食事の時間の合図
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the signal for Babora’s meal time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が隠れている皿が持ち上げられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The plate Lance and the others are hiding under is lifted up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと落ちそうになったりとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It almost fell a little...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、目の前にバボラの顔がきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then Babora’s face came right in front of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラは食事しようとして皿を持ち上げていたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora was lifting the plate to eat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、作戦成功だ。足では逃げられたが顔を潰せば勝ちだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, the plan worked. Although it escaped with its feet, if we crush its face, we win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here we go—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦闘においては、毎ターン　バボラを混乱させておく必要があります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this battle, you need to keep Babora confused every turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱してないと、正気に戻り、冷静に対処を考えてしまうため、３回正気だとそれで負けます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If not confused, Babora regains composure and thinks calmly about countermeasures; if it is sane three times, you lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラ、皿をもったまま何か考えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora is thinking about something while holding the plate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ・・なんで食べ物か殴ってくるのだ、痛いよ、これ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh... why is it hitting the food? This hurts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か考えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s thinking about something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦闘においては、毎ターン　バボラを混乱させておく必要があります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this battle, you need to keep Babora confused every turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱してないと、正気に戻り、冷静に対処を考えてしまうため、３回正気だとそれで負けます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If not confused, Babora regains composure and thinks calmly about countermeasures; if it is sane three times, you lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラ考える・・・はっ何か思いついたみたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora is thinking... aha, it seems to have come up with something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皿をふりふりする、ランス達があわあわと揺れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It shakes the plate, Lance and the others wobble anxiously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずいぞ奴に気がつかれたかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, it might have noticed us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気がつかれてたった・・何に？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's noticed us... at what?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔面前で皿を持っているのはあいつ自身だ、この皿をひっくり返されたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one holding the plate in front of its face is it itself; if this plate is flipped over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達は地上にまっさかさに落ちて・・この高さだと死ぬ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we’ll plummet straight down to the ground... at this height, we’d die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦闘においては、毎ターン　バボラを混乱させておく必要があります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this battle, you need to keep Babora confused every turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱してないと、正気に戻り、冷静に対処を考えてしまうため、３回正気だとそれで負けます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If not confused, Babora regains composure and thinks calmly about countermeasures; if it is sane three times, you lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラ考える・・・ぴこーん閃いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora is thinking... ding! It’s had an idea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、そうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皿をひっくり返した、ランス達、あれーーーと落ちる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It flipped the plate over; Lance and the others go 'whah—' and fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｇａｍｅｏｖｅｒ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Game Over

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラは顔を攻撃されまくって失神寸前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Babora is being pummeled in the face and is about to faint.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふらふらと倒れていく、あっ、ランス様　こっちに倒れると下の方に町があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It staggers and begins to fall. Ah, Lord Lance, if it falls this way, there’s a town down below.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町が下敷きになってしまいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The town would be crushed underneath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、こっちに倒れるな　ランスキーーック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, don’t fall that way! Lance Kick!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスキックで頭を蹴り、後ろに倒れるようにする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance kicks its head, making it fall backward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れたバボラは魔物軍を多数踏みつぶして息絶える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fallen Babora crushes many of the monster army and expires.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘後、ラングバウ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the battle, at Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は戻っており、シーラ、クリーム、ヒューバートなどと話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others have returned and are talking with Sheila, Cream, Hubert, and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラは倒れ、死んだ事により、魔軍は動揺したのかちりぢりに逃げていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With demon Babora defeated and dead, the demon army was unsettled and scattered to flee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン軍が追撃をかけてだいぶ奪われた土地を取り返す事に成功
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hermann's army launched a pursuit and succeeded in reclaiming much of the lost land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか戦線は維持された、だが、まだ魔人ケッセルリンクと数十万の魔軍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The front line is somehow maintained, but the demon Kesselring and hundreds of thousands of demon troops

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン方面に展開しており楽観は出来ない状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are deployed near Hermann’s area, so the situation cannot be taken lightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかキャラ同士の掛け合い、ビジュアルは無いけどシーラとのエロでもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhat having banter between characters; there’s no visual, but maybe an erotic scene with Sheila would be good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔物大将軍ルメイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the great demon general Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラ様がやられただと・・ぐぬぬぬぬぬ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora-sama was defeated... Grrrrrrrrr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスの存在は事実だったのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So the existence of the demon sword Chaos was true...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text: Grrrrrrrrr."},{"lineNumber":253251,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔剣カオスの存在は事実だったのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"So the existence of the demon sword Chaos was true..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択肢
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Choices

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　皿に隠れておく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Hide under the plate

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　巨大かなみをぶつける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Hit with a giant Kanami

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After choosing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、ここに隠れて居るぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'm hiding here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じっ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stare...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: するとバボラが皿を持った、ふわっと浮上していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Babora held the plate and floated up gently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し揺れながら上がっていく途中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As it rose, it swayed a little.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラの足、腰・・あたり・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around Babora's feet and waist...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 料理が落ちないようにバボラがおっとっととゆっくり上げている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora is carefully raising it slowly so the food doesn't fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達も、ぐらぐらと落ちないように注意・・誰かに抱きつかれるとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others also carefully steady themselves so as not to fall... like being grabbed by someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふぉーーーーん、何か音がなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fwoooon, some kind of sound was heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラの食事の時間の合図
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the signal for Babora’s meal time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が隠れている皿が持ち上げられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The plate Lance and the others are hiding under is lifted up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと落ちそうになったりとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It almost fell a little...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、目の前にバボラの顔がきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then Babora’s face came right in front of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラは食事しようとして皿を持ち上げていたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora was lifting the plate to eat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、作戦成功だ。足では逃げられたが顔を潰せば勝ちだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, the plan worked. Although it escaped with its feet, if we crush its face, we win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here we go—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦闘においては、毎ターン　バボラを混乱させておく必要があります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this battle, you need to keep Babora confused every turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱してないと、正気に戻り、冷静に対処を考えてしまうため、３回正気だとそれで負けます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If not confused, Babora regains composure and thinks calmly about countermeasures; if it is sane three times, you lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラ、皿をもったまま何か考えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora is thinking about something while holding the plate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ・・なんで食べ物か殴ってくるのだ、痛いよ、これ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh... why is it hitting the food? This hurts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か考えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s thinking about something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦闘においては、毎ターン　バボラを混乱させておく必要があります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this battle, you need to keep Babora confused every turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱してないと、正気に戻り、冷静に対処を考えてしまうため、３回正気だとそれで負けます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If not confused, Babora regains composure and thinks calmly about countermeasures; if it is sane three times, you lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラ考える・・・はっ何か思いついたみたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora is thinking... aha, it seems to have come up with something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皿をふりふりする、ランス達があわあわと揺れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It shakes the plate, Lance and the others wobble anxiously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずいぞ奴に気がつかれたかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, it might have noticed us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気がつかれてたった・・何に？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's noticed us... at what?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔面前で皿を持っているのはあいつ自身だ、この皿をひっくり返されたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one holding the plate in front of its face is it itself; if this plate is flipped over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達は地上にまっさかさに落ちて・・この高さだと死ぬ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we’ll plummet straight down to the ground... at this height, we’d die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦闘においては、毎ターン　バボラを混乱させておく必要があります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this battle, you need to keep Babora confused every turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱してないと、正気に戻り、冷静に対処を考えてしまうため、３回正気だとそれで負けます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If not confused, Babora regains composure and thinks calmly about countermeasures; if it is sane three times, you lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラ考える・・・ぴこーん閃いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora is thinking... ding! It’s had an idea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、そうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皿をひっくり返した、ランス達、あれーーーと落ちる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It flipped the plate over; Lance and the others go 'whah—' and fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｇａｍｅｏｖｅｒ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Game Over

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラは顔を攻撃されまくって失神寸前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Babora is being pummeled in the face and is about to faint.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふらふらと倒れていく、あっ、ランス様　こっちに倒れると下の方に町があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It staggers and begins to fall. Ah, Lord Lance, if it falls this way, there’s a town down below.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町が下敷きになってしまいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The town would be crushed underneath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、こっちに倒れるな　ランスキーーック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, don’t fall that way! Lance Kick!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスキックで頭を蹴り、後ろに倒れるようにする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance kicks its head, making it fall backward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れたバボラは魔物軍を多数踏みつぶして息絶える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fallen Babora crushes many of the monster army and expires.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘後、ラングバウ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the battle, at Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は戻っており、シーラ、クリーム、ヒューバートなどと話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others have returned and are talking with Sheila, Cream, Hubert, and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラは倒れ、死んだ事により、魔軍は動揺したのかちりぢりに逃げていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With demon Babora defeated and dead, the demon army was unsettled and scattered to flee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン軍が追撃をかけてだいぶ奪われた土地を取り返す事に成功
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hermann's army launched a pursuit and succeeded in reclaiming much of the lost land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか戦線は維持された、だが、まだ魔人ケッセルリンクと数十万の魔軍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The front line is somehow maintained, but the demon Kesselring and hundreds of thousands of demon troops

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン方面に展開しており楽観は出来ない状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are deployed near Hermann’s area, so the situation cannot be taken lightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかキャラ同士の掛け合い、ビジュアルは無いけどシーラとのエロでもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhat having banter between characters; there’s no visual, but maybe an erotic scene with Sheila would be good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔物大将軍ルメイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the great demon general Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラ様がやられただと・・ぐぬぬぬぬぬ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora-sama was defeated... Grrrrrrrrr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスの存在は事実だったのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So the existence of the demon sword Chaos was true...
